component.name: kcli
component.summary: Management tool for virtualization and kubernetes platforms

description.p: This tool is meant to interact with existing virtualization providers (libvirt, KubeVirt, oVirt, OpenStack, VMware vSphere, AWS, Azure, GCP, IBM cloud and Hcloud) and to easily deploy and customize VMs from cloud images.
Latest kcli release with virtualization and Kubernetes management capabilities.
